amendatorysection.para: Traffic control device shall mean any sign, signal, marking, or other device not inconsistent with the Nebraska Rules of the Road placed or erected by authority of a public body or official having jurisdiction for the purpose of regulating, warning, or guiding traffic.

annotation.para: A "Road Closed" sign is a traffic control device. State v. Morrissey, 19 Neb. App. 590, 810 N.W.2d 195 (2012).
